sentences.en: Disabled and various disadvantaged groups are encouraged to register as vendors.
sentences.cn: 有鼓励残障、弱势团体去登记卖券.

sentences.en: Encourage suppliers to improve availability of effective affordable fluoride toothpaste for disadvantaged populations.
sentences.cn: 鼓励供应方改善弱势群体对负担得起的、有效的含氟牙膏的可获得性.

sentences.en: Fire works a pet project of the centrifugal pump will not be disadvantaged natural!
sentences.cn: 工程火,做为工程项目宠儿的离心泵自然就不会受冷落!

sentences.en: He knows his disadvantaged situation in the company and does everything carefully.
sentences.cn: 他知道自己在公司处境不好,做事都小心翼翼的.

sentences.en: His engagement with other children was severely disadvantaged.
sentences.cn: 他与其他孩子的交往能力受到严重的不利影响.
我因病而处于不利地位.

sentences.en: I would be educationally disadvantaged further by attending the local comprehensive.
sentences.cn: 参加当地的综合测试,我在教育上就会更加处于不利地位.

sentences.en: Meal should not speak on the digestion and absorption of otherwise disadvantaged.
sentences.cn: 吃饭时不宜说话,否则对消化吸收不利.

sentences.en: Regions can be disadvantaged by their distance from population or production centers.
sentences.cn: 远离人口密集地或生产中心会阻止地区的发展.

sentences.en: Share best practice in diabetes education, prevention and care that targets disadvantaged and vulnerable groups.
sentences.cn: 与糖尿病弱势群体分享最好的教育 、 预防和治疗手段.

sentences.en: Some lack sympathy for those in disadvantaged circumstances.
sentences.cn: 有些人缺乏对弱势群体的同情.

sentences.en: Special employment assistance should be given to members of disadvantaged groups.
sentences.cn: 对弱势群体给予特殊的就业援助.

sentences.en: The centre aims to help disadvantaged areas of Europe, mainly by fostering new businesses.
sentences.cn: 该中心旨在帮助欧洲的贫困地区，方法主要是通过扶持新型商业。

sentences.en: The disadvantaged students in class are existed in the school.
sentences.cn: 班级弱势群体是学校教育中的客观存在.

sentences.en: We have set up a $ 200 million Partnership Fund for the Disadvantaged.
sentences.cn: 我们设立了二亿元的携手扶弱基金.

words.tran_cn: 贫困的；处于不利地位的；社会地位低下的

phrases.tran_cn: 不幸儿童；生活条件差的儿童

trans.tran_cn: 弱势的；社会地位低下的,下层社会
trans.tran_en: having social problems, such as a lack of money or education, which make it difficult for you to succeed

trans.tran_cn: 使处于不利地位（disadvantage的过去式和过去分词）
使处于不利地位(disadvantage的过去式和过去分词)
